Articles.Content:
Hi,

Just wanted to share with everyone, Destructoid did a new review of KSP:

[http://www.destructoid.com/revisiting-the-kerbal-space-program-224625.phtml](http://www.destructoid.com/revisiting-the-kerbal-space-program-224625.phtml)

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Cheers

Cool!

If you\'re reading in between the lines, you can definitely tell how much this game has improved. Great work!

First screenshot = Explosion with dead kerbals.

Seems legit.
